    1.0

    • Field Summary

      private boolean alive
      Tracks whether or not the Player has been killed
      private int direction
      The direction we should be displaying the player spite in
      private java.util.ArrayList<Item> inventory
      An array list used as the Player Inventory, items will be added and removed during gameplay
      private Position position 
      private static javafx.scene.image.Image SPRITE
      The Sprite used for the Player object, it will be rotated based on direction
      private int tokenCount
      How many Tokens the Player is currently carrying

      • movePlayerEntity

        private Entity[][] movePlayerEntity(int[] locations,
                                    Level level)
        Used to move the player object in the Entity grid
        Parameters:
        locations - the current and potential new X and Y location of the player
        level - the current Level object, this contains both the Cell and Entity grids
        Returns:
        the updated Entity grid for displaying to the screen

      • move

                       Level level)
        Used to move the Player in the Entity grid
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction the Player wishes to move
        level - the Level object in which they are moving
        Returns:
        the updated Entity grid for displaying to the screen

                     Level level)

        level - the Level object, if it needs updating as a result
